meanings.definition: Relating to or situated between galaxies.
meanings.sent1: The aliens traveled through the intergalactic space to reach our galaxy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the intergalactic phenomena to understand the universe better.
meanings.sent3: The intergalactic tourists got lost in space and ended up in a different galaxy.
meanings.sent4: The intergalactic journey felt like a dream, with stars as their guide.
meanings.sent5: The intergalactic adventure was filled with wonder and discovery.

meanings.sent1: The spaceship embarked on an intergalactic mission to explore distant galaxies.
meanings.sent2: The intergalactic travelers encountered new civilizations beyond our galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The intergalactic explorers had a picnic on a comet between galaxies.
meanings.sent4: Their intergalactic voyage was like sailing through a cosmic ocean.
meanings.sent5: The intergalactic odyssey was a thrilling journey through the stars.
